channel.title: Hey guys if anyone can help/show me how to make a command in eclipse 639
channel.description: hey guys i know where to edit the commands and teles and stuff but i neeed someone to show me how to code a command so that it will tell me my coords.... thanks moparscape :) :) :)

item.title: Hey guys if anyone can help/show me how to make a command in eclipse 639
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Inside the method handle there is this

you use that for your command ex:

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("Your command")) { //Your command code }

You gotta learn how to use some arrays…

Read full topic
